SELECT yes.id, yes.file_name AS fileName, ymt.name AS masterTaskName, ifnull(ymt.id,yes.ys_master_task_id) AS ysMasterTaskId, yes.file_content AS fileContent, yes.sug_time AS sugTime, ysc.sug_content AS sugContent, yesf.id fileId, yesf.exp_sug_id AS fileMasterId, yesf.name, yesf.file_md5 fileMd5 FROM ys_exp_sug yes LEFT JOIN ys_master_task ymt ON yes.ys_master_task_id = ymt.id LEFT JOIN ys_exp_sug_file yesf ON yes.id = yesf.exp_sug_id LEFT JOIN ys_sug_comment ysc ON ysc.exp_sug_id = yes.id WHERE 1=1
AND yes.id=#{id}

SELECT yesf.id, yesf.name AS fjName, yesf.file_url AS fileUrl, yesf.file_size AS fileSize FROM ys_exp_sug_file yesf LEFT JOIN ys_exp_sug ydr ON ydr.id = yesf.exp_sug_id WHERE ydr.id = #{id} AND yesf.del_flag = 0

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT yes.id, yes.file_name AS fileName, yes.sug_time AS sugTime, ymt.name AS masterTaskName, ifnull(ymt.id,yes.ys_master_task_id) AS ysMasterTaskId, tu.username AS username, yes.create_time AS createTime, yesf.id AS fileId, ysc.sug_status AS sugStatus FROM ys_exp_sug yes LEFT JOIN ys_master_task ymt ON yes.ys_master_task_id = ymt.id LEFT JOIN t_user tu ON yes.user_id = tu.id LEFT JOIN ys_exp_sug_file yesf ON yes.id = yesf.exp_sug_id LEFT JOIN ys_sug_comment ysc ON ysc.exp_sug_id = yes.id WHERE yes.ys_master_task_id IN ( SELECT ys_master_task_id FROM ys_task_receive WHERE receive_id = #{userId} ) AND yes.del_flag = 0 UNION SELECT yes.id, yes.file_name AS fileName, yes.sug_time AS sugTime, ymt.name AS masterTaskName, ifnull(ymt.id,yes.ys_master_task_id) AS ysMasterTaskId, tu.username AS username, yes.create_time AS createTime, yesf.id AS fileId, ysc.sug_status AS sugStatus FROM ys_exp_sug yes LEFT JOIN ys_master_task ymt ON yes.ys_master_task_id = ymt.id LEFT JOIN t_user tu ON yes.user_id = tu.id LEFT JOIN ys_exp_sug_file yesf ON yes.id = yesf.exp_sug_id LEFT JOIN ys_sug_comment ysc ON ysc.exp_sug_id = yes.id WHERE yes.ys_master_task_id IN ( SELECT id FROM ys_master_task WHERE `status` = '1' ) AND yes.del_flag = 0 ) aa WHERE 1=1
AND ysMasterTaskId = #{ysMasterTaskId}
AND fileName LIKE CONCAT('%',#{fileName},'%')
GROUP BY id ORDER BY createTime DESC

SELECT yes.id, yes.file_name AS fileName, yes.sug_time AS sugTime, ymt.name AS masterTaskName, ifnull(ymt.id,yes.ys_master_task_id) AS ysMasterTaskId, tu.username AS username, yes.create_time AS createTime, yesf.id AS fileId, ysc.sug_status AS sugStatus FROM ys_exp_sug yes LEFT JOIN ys_master_task ymt ON yes.ys_master_task_id = ymt.id LEFT JOIN t_user tu ON yes.user_id = tu.id LEFT JOIN ys_exp_sug_file yesf ON yes.id = yesf.exp_sug_id LEFT JOIN ys_sug_comment ysc ON ysc.exp_sug_id = yes.id WHERE 1=1 AND yes.del_flag = 0
AND ifnull(ymt.id,yes.ys_master_task_id) = #{ysMasterTaskId}
AND yes.file_name like trim(replace(CONCAT('%',#{fileName},'%'),' ',''))
GROUP BY id ORDER BY createTime DESC
